item.title: How many homes heat with wood?
item.description: Photo by Andreas Pajuvirta on Unsplash The bill that was left on our door was what many homeowners are hit with this time of year: $1,082 for 175 gallons. Like most homes in central Maine, we heat with fuel oil in the winter. Itâ€™s a common source of home heating across northern New England, and the high price of heating oil was brought up repeatedly throughout the midterm elections.
